title: About Us
intro: Sushi Takumi combines the traditional art of Japanese cuisine with modern hospitality spirit.
description: We proudly serve handcrafted sushi with delicate flavors, rich taste, and the freshest ingredients every day.

fresh.title: Fresh Daily
fresh.description: We carefully select the freshest ingredients every day to ensure the highest quality in each dish.

art.title: Sushi Craftsmanship
art.description: Each sushi piece is a work of art, crafted by the skilled hands of Takumi chefs.

space.title: Japanese Ambience
space.description: Diners will enjoy a cozy, refined Japanese atmosphere right in the heart of Saigon.
